locales.name: Anti-LGBTQ+ Hate
locales.description: Anti-LGBTQ+ disinformation tropes and slurs

locales.name: Links conspiracy theory content
locales.description: Links to 'disruptive' conspiracy theories offsite. Content is intended to dumb down, fearmonger and sow division in its readership

locales.name: Links anti-science content
locales.description: Links to anti-science conspiracy theory or misinformation. Examples: anti-vaxxers, MAGA/MAHA RFK Jr and Dr Oz shills, quack remedies for medically-treatable conditions, '5G kills' fearmongers, chemtrail-phobia

locales.name: Cites suspect source
locales.description: Cites source known for mixing unreliable and factual content. Requires critical thinking to engage with any linked offsite content.

locales.name: Links to Telegram
locales.description: Links to content hosted on russian-owned Telegram. Expect little or no content moderation, and a pro-russian bias. The Wild West of social media, personal data and device at risk.

locales.name: Links to TikTok
locales.description: Links to content hosted on Chinese-owned TikTok. Engagement assumes risk of the Chinese government harvesting your device and account data and of being co-opted to promulgate Chinese Communist Party propaganda.

locales.name: Links to a Meta Platform
locales.description: Links to content hosted on one of  Meta's social media platforms. Engagement implicitly supports the spread of hate speech and lies, since Meta has disavowed content moderation to help prevent this.

locales.name: Links to x.com
locales.description: Links to content hosted on Elon Musk's X disinformation platform. Engagement directly helps fund the spread of fascism.

locales.name: Link to Disinfo
locales.description: Post or other content contains link(s) to disinformation content, hosted outside the Bluesky platform.

locales.name: Hateful Symbol
locales.description: Symbology celebrating violence or hate. Examples include swastika, hammer and sickle: both symbolize genocidal ideologies.

locales.name: Ableism
locales.description: Slurs and abuse targeting the differently-abled

locales.name: Misogyny
locales.description: Anti-female slurs and abuse

locales.name: High hashtag count
locales.description: Hashtag count exceeds high percentile threshold measured across all tag-facet usage

locales.name: High link count
locales.description: Offsite content link count exceeds high percentile threshold measured across all link-facet usage

locales.name: High user mention count
locales.description: 'Users mentioned' count exceeds high percentile threshold measured across all mention-facet usage

locales.name: High total facet count
locales.description: Aggregate count of user mentions, offsite links and hashtags exceeds high percentile threshold measured across all facet usage

locales.name: Alt-right Platform Link
locales.description: Contains a link to content hosted on an alt-right platform.

locales.name: Misinformation
locales.description: Unintentional mistakes, including dissemination of benign content from 60/40 disinfo accounts, and innocent but harmful factual errors.

locales.name: Network Member
locales.description: Account appears to be part of a network of coordinating peers.

locales.name: Exercise Caution
locales.description: Known for mixing unreliable posts with factual content. Not an overt 60/40 propagandist. Requires critical thinking to engage safely.

locales.name: Blocks Moderation
locales.description: Account blocks NAFO Forum Moderation Service. Exercise caution and critical thinking. Other labels may be present if reliably reported.

locales.name: Evasion
locales.description: Ban evaders, multiple account holders, or using obfuscation to post slurs and other covered content. Includes cross-linking of content from off-platform entities and people.

locales.name: Violent Content
locales.description: Violent speech including media. Threats, incitement, celebration, wishing harm, hateful references to or denial of confirmed mass casualty events.

locales.name: Graphic Media
locales.description: Gratuitously graphic media, violent or sexual content. Typically, also report to platform.

locales.name: Fake Account
locales.description: Impersonating community member or other well-known account. Beware of fundraising links or unsolicited DMs.

locales.name: Repetitive
locales.description: Repetitive behaviour, including spamming the same reply or image

locales.name: Under Review
locales.description: Status unconfirmed.

locales.name: Disinformation
locales.description: Account is well-known as a spreader of disinformation, or  post contains disinformation. Includes denial of documented events. Includes known 60/40 disinfo mixers.

locales.name: Parody
locales.description: Non-harmful parody account, labeled only to avoid confusion and distraction

locales.name: Disruptive
locales.description: Unconstructive conflict within the fella community, or outside attack, possibly designed to distract from more important things. Includes low-reach 60/40 disinfo mixers. Includes community interfering with Ukrainians' management of their infospace. Includes apparent infiltrators, using inauthentic persona to sow division. Includes nuisance repliers and quote posters.

locales.name: Abusive
locales.description: Rude or impolite, including crude language and disrespectful comments, without constructive purpose.

locales.name: Engagement Farmer
locales.description: Insincere content or bulk actions aimed at gaining followers, including frequent follows, posts, and likes. Beware of off-site links. Includes possible or confirmed frauds.
